data.eml:eml: A new genus of Phlugidini (Orthoptera: Tettigoniidae: Meconematinae) with asymmetrical mandibles

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Chamorro-Rengifo, Juliana, Olivier, Renan Da Silva (2017): A new genus of Phlugidini (Orthoptera: Tettigoniidae: Meconematinae) with asymmetrical mandibles. Zootaxa 4286 (3): 391-400, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4286.3.6
